name: Ollo's Life
description:
# Ollo's life

## Description

### Ollo is a little kitty  

His human friend always gets into trouble.
You have to rescue him, and maybe save his life from a terrible death.

## The Game

 This game is a fully working Gameboy game! You can even play it in your Gameboy if you flash the rom.
 You can still play it on itch.io thanks to the javascript emulator.
 Ollo is sleeping, waiting for you!

## >>CONTROLS<<

 - Arrows to move
 - Z to interact
